labels.label: Reminder: VERY IMPORTANT TO CHANGE THE HDFS CREATE ROUTE TO THAT INDICATED FOR THE TABLE TO BE CHARGED

*DEV*
Activar el ParquetReader del Processor PutParquet
Cambiar la Query ETL y el Create (Create con ; Select sin ;)
Cambiar registro tabla Control - M
Dejar el Process Group en STOP una vez terminadas las pruebas.
Comprobar en HIVE que los datos no estan a NULL y son leidos ( Select *).
Reminder: VERY IMPORTANT TO CHANGE THE HDFS DELETE ROUTE TO THAT INDICATED FOR THE TABLE TO BE CHARGED
Reminder: VERY IMPORTANT TO CHANGE THE HDFS CREATE ROUTE TO THAT INDICATED FOR THE TABLE TO BE CHARGED

entry.value: CREATE external TABLE IF NOT EXISTS basededatosdestino.tabladestino ( CampoID int, Cod varchar (10), Desc varchar (100), Sysdate STRING, FechaDato STRING ) COMMENT "Dimension SCD Type 1" STORED AS PARQUET LOCATION '/insertar/directorio/que/sera/creado/y_donde_depositaremos_el_fichero_parquet_de_esta_tabla'

select tablaorigen.id as CampoID, tablaorigen.code as Cod, tablaorigen.descripcion as Desc, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) AS Sysdate, tablaorigen.createdon as FechaDato from basededatosorigen.tablaorigen

processors.name: SelectHiveQL - Create Table, ETL Query Select, Running Flag
